languages.text: "Нет нужды. Шепот крови приведет нас к Немезиту". {n}Слова Кибеллы заставляют Иокасту и Энриха недоуменно переглянуться.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Нет нужды. Шепот крови приведет нас к Немезиту". {n}Слова Кибеллы заставляют Иокасту и Энриха недоуменно переглянуться.{/n}

languages.text: "There is no need. The blood's whisper will lead us to Nemesite." {n}Kibellah's words make the two exchange puzzled glances.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Нет нужды. Шепот крови приведет нас к Немезиту". {n}Слова Кибеллы заставляют Иокасту и Энриха недоуменно переглянуться.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "There is no need. The blood's whisper will lead us to Nemesite." {n}Kibellah's words make the two exchange puzzled glances.{/n}
"There is no need. I know where Nemesite has gone." {n}Kibellah's words make Jocasta and Einrich exchanged puzzled glances.{/n}
"There is no need. The blood's whisper will lead us to Nemesite." {n}Kibellah's words make the two exchange puzzled glances.{/n}

"There is no need. The blood's whisper will lead us to Nemesite." {n}Kibellah's words make the two exchange puzzled glances.{/n}

languages.text: "Das ist nicht nötig. Das Flüstern des Blutes wird uns zu Nemesit führen." {n}Die beiden anderen tauschen nach Kibellahs Worte irritierte Blicke aus.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There is no need. The blood's whisper will lead us to Nemesite." {n}Kibellah's words make the two exchange puzzled glances.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das ist nicht nötig. Das Flüstern des Blutes wird uns zu Nemesit führen." {n}Die beiden anderen tauschen nach Kibellahs Worte irritierte Blicke aus.{/n}

languages.text: «No hará falta. Los susurros de la sangre nos llevarán hasta Nemesitio». {n}Al escuchar lo que dice Kibellah, los dos se intercambian miradas de desconcierto.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There is no need. The blood's whisper will lead us to Nemesite." {n}Kibellah's words make the two exchange puzzled glances.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No hará falta. Los susurros de la sangre nos llevarán hasta Nemesitio». {n}Al escuchar lo que dice Kibellah, los dos se intercambian miradas de desconcierto.{/n}

languages.text: 「その必要はありません。血の囁きがネメサイトのもとへと導いてくれるでしょう」{n}キベラの言葉に、2人は戸惑って顔を見合わせる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "There is no need. The blood's whisper will lead us to Nemesite." {n}Kibellah's words make the two exchange puzzled glances.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「その必要はありません。血の囁きがネメサイトのもとへと導いてくれるでしょう」{n}キベラの言葉に、2人は戸惑って顔を見合わせる。{/n}

languages.text: “没必要这么做，鲜血的低语会指引我们找到涅墨斯特。”{n}绮贝菈开了口，另外两人困惑地对视一眼。{/n}
languages.original_text: "There is no need. The blood's whisper will lead us to Nemesite." {n}Kibellah's words make the two exchange puzzled glances.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “没必要这么做，鲜血的低语会指引我们找到涅墨斯特。”{n}绮贝菈开了口，另外两人困惑地对视一眼。{/n}

languages.text: « C'est inutile. Les murmures du sang nous mèneront jusqu'à Némésite. » {n}La déclaration de Kibellah provoque l'échange de regards surpris entre ses deux interlocuteurs.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There is no need. The blood's whisper will lead us to Nemesite." {n}Kibellah's words make the two exchange puzzled glances.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « C'est inutile. Les murmures du sang nous mèneront jusqu'à Némésite. » {n}La déclaration de Kibellah provoque l'échange de regards surpris entre ses deux interlocuteurs.{/n}

languages.text: "Gerek yok. Kanın fısıltısı, bizi Nemezit'e yönlendirecektir." {n}Kibellah'nın sözleri, ikilinin şaşkınlıkla birbirine bakmasına neden oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There is no need. The blood's whisper will lead us to Nemesite." {n}Kibellah's words make the two exchange puzzled glances.{/n}
